name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Ivankov vs Magellan - The Delaying Battle
keyMoments.description: Ivankov stays behind on Level 3 to face Warden Magellan, using Newkama Kenpo to buy time for Luffy's escape.
keyMoments.significance: A heroic sacrifice showing Ivankov's commitment to helping Dragon's son and the Revolutionary Army's cause.
keyMoments.quote: Viva Revolution! I'll hold him here!

keyMoments.title: Mudage Shori Ken (Hair Removal Fist)
keyMoments.description: Ivankov uses the Hair Removal Fist technique from Newkama Kenpo against Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a new named technique in Ivankov's fighting arsenal.

keyMoments.title: Mascara Defense Trick
keyMoments.description: Ivankov tricks Magellan by using thick mascara to protect against poison, demonstrating creative combat tactics.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ivankov's clever use of appearance and accessories in battle strategy.
keyMoments.quote: My mascara is so thick, it protected me from your poison!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Magellan
keyMoments.description: Despite valiant efforts, Ivankov is overwhelmed and poisoned by Magellan's Hydra attack.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating defeat showing Magellan's overwhelming power and the desperate situation of the escape.

abilities.description: Hair Removal Fist - A Newkama Kenpo technique used against Magellan.

reveals.information: Uses thick mascara as protection against poison in combat

keyMoments.title: Venom Road Technique
keyMoments.description: Magellan uses Venom Road, engulfing himself in poison and traveling through his Hydra to bypass destroyed stairs and quickly traverse between levels.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a new mobility application of the Doku Doku no Mi, showing why Magellan is such an effective prison warden.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Ivankov
keyMoments.description: Magellan overwhelms and defeats Emporio Ivankov, one of the Revolutionary Army's commanders, with his poison abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's overwhelming power against even top-tier opponents.

keyMoments.title: Poisons Inazuma
keyMoments.description: After defeating Ivankov, Magellan catches and poisons Inazuma who attempted to further delay him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Magellan's relentless pursuit and the mounting casualties of the escape attempt.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Luffy and the Escapees
keyMoments.description: Magellan catches up to Luffy's group on Level 1, manifesting his Hydra and creating the final obstacle to their escape.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic confrontation of the Impel Down arc with Ace's execution looming.

abilities.description: Magellan engulfs himself in poison and travels through his Hydra's body to quickly move between locations.

keyMoments.title: O Kanabashi - Cutting the Stairs
keyMoments.description: Inazuma uses the Choki Choki no Mi to cut through the stone staircase between Level 3 and Level 2, creating a barrier against Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: First named technique demonstration by Inazuma, showing the creative potential of the Scissors-Scissors Fruit.
keyMoments.quote: I'll cut down the stairs! That should buy us some time!

keyMoments.title: Poisoned While Delaying Magellan
keyMoments.description: After Ivankov's defeat, Inazuma attempts to further delay Magellan but is caught and poisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Another sacrifice by a Revolutionary Army member showing their commitment to helping Luffy.

abilities.description: Using the Choki Choki no Mi to cut through solid structures like stairs.
A technique using the Choki Choki no Mi powers to create barriers or obstacles.

keyMoments.title: Reaches Level 1 of Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Luffy and his allies successfully reach Level 1, the final level before escape from Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Marks major progress in the prison break and brings Luffy closer to reaching Marineford to save Ace.

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Buggy and Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Luffy happily reunites with Buggy and Galdino on Level 1, expressing relief at their safety.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's ability to form bonds even with former enemies during their shared struggle.
keyMoments.quote: Buggy! Mr. 3! You guys are safe!

keyMoments.title: Defeats the Jailer Beasts
keyMoments.description: Luffy and his powerful allies quickly overwhelm all four Jailer Beasts on Level 1.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power of Luffy's alliance compared to his earlier struggles in Impel Down.

keyMoments.title: Faces Magellan Again
keyMoments.description: Magellan appears before Luffy and the escapees, creating a final obstacle between them and freedom.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up a critical confrontation with time running out to save Ace.

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Buggy reunites with Luffy on Level 1 during the escape attempt.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the unlikely alliance between former enemies.

keyMoments.title: Helps Defeat Jailer Beasts
keyMoments.description: Buggy participates in the group effort to defeat the four Jailer Beasts on Level 1.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Buggy continuing to contribute to the escape effort.

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Galdino (Mr. 3) reunites with Luffy on Level 1 during the escape.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the partnership between Luffy and former Baroque Works agents.

keyMoments.title: Helps Defeat Jailer Beasts
keyMoments.description: Galdino helps the group defeat the Jailer Beasts on Level 1.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Mr. 3 contributing his abilities to the escape effort.
